forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny. High 17C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and a few clouds. High 63F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy this evening with more clouds for overnight. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 12C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 53F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain. Low 8C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 47F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning with some clearing in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with mostly cloudy conditions later in the day. High around 55F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. Low around 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some sun in the morning with increasing clouds during the afternoon. Slight chance of a rain shower. High around 15C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 58F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 8C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 47F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny early. Becoming mostly cloudy with showers developing later in the day. High near 15C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low 47F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High around 15C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 58F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 8C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 47F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 13C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High around 55F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly cloudy. Low 9C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. Low 48F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 13C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High around 55F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 49F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High near 55F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early. A few showers developing later in the day. High 12C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with a few showers. High 53F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies early. Becoming mostly cloudy with showers developing later at night. Low 46F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
